title: Ekadantam bhajEham
sahitya:
Ekadantam bhajEham EkAnEka phala pradam


anupallavi

 pAkashAsan-ArAdhitam pAmara paNDitAdi nuta padam


caraNam   kailAsa nAtha kumAram kArtikEya manOharam hAlAsya kSEtra 
vEgavatI taTa vihAram haram kOlAhala guruguha sahitam kOTi mAra 
lAvaNya hitam mAlA kaNkaNAdi dharaNam mASA vallabhAmbA ramaNam
